summary: This mod adds Keri a Nord based companion with intense combat skills and essential beauty.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][color=#ff00ff]I present Keri, a Nord based follower with immense combat skills and abilities. She is powerful enough to take a beating, yet not too overpowered. 
She also uses all three combat skills (Melee, Ranged, And Magic) with great skill. She is set to level with the player and will beat down enemies at all levels and strengths. Please read the whole description before asking questions and if you use AFT or UFO don't forget to move Keri ABOVE those mods in load order to avoid complications. Thank you for your support! 
[/color]
[youtube]r9ulLHh57-c[/youtube][/size]

[color=#ffff00][size=4]STATS:

Location: Brittleshin Pass (coc brittleshinpass01)
Race Nord
Essential
Marriageable 
Height 1.0
Weight 100
Dual Wielder 
Class: Spellsword
Combat: Focus on Melee and Ranged with Flames and Sparks spell.



ARMOR:
Armor in the banner: [url=http://kp4068.tistory.com/2202?category=584228]CBBE Leifang AQUAPLUS Mashup TBBP[/url]
Armor in the 2nd screen: [url=http://kp4068.tistory.com/2197?category=584228]CBBE Kokoro Halloween TBBP[/url]
Armor in the 4th and 5th screens:: [url=http://gomaperopero.tumblr.com/post/173765318750/gomaperoland-v3]GomaPeroLand V3[/url]
